title: Wings of Fate
description: A MistakeA MetamorphosisA Planet's Only HopeAn epic mistake leads to Petra’s banishment from the only home she’s ever known. Her aunt takes her in with a warning that she must learn all she can before she makes amends to the influential tribe she gravely insulted. As part of her new curriculum, she’s thrown head first into the culture of the planet’s natives, the Kalians. Or as the humans call them, Angels.With the sudden appearance of shadow people and threats from unknown sources, will Petra survive long enough to atone for her blunder?
author: M.C. Leavitt
